data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 2, Guadalajara's Uriel Antuna is on target but unsuccessful.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
In the minute 3, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Nicolas Diaz gives Mazatlan a 0-1 lead in Zapopan.
In the minute 6, Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Mazatlan.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Guadalajara.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Goal! Guadalajara go level at 1-1 through Jesus Molina in Zapopan.
In the minute 13, Alexis Vega instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 16, In Zapopan Guadalajara attack through Cristian Calderon. The finish is off target, however.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
Guadalajara's Jose Macias gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Akron.
Ball safe as Mazatlan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Mario Osuna (Mazatlan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick Guadalajara.
Free kick in a good position for Guadalajara!
In the minute 28, Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Penalty! Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez points to the spot, great chance for Guadalajara...
Mario Osuna has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
In the minute 33, Jose Macias smashes in a penalty at Estadio Akron. The score is now 2-1.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Akron.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 37, Free kick Mazatlan.
Mazatlan's Cesar Huerta breaks free at Estadio Akron. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
In the minute 40, Guadalajara's Cristian Calderon gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Akron. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Guadalajara.
Hiram Mier (Guadalajara) has received a first yellow card.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio Akron.
Ball safe as Mazatlan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Zapopan.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Zapopan.
Gonzalo Jara is replacing Luis Mendoza for the away team.
In the minute 49, Jose Macias for Guadalajara drives towards goal at Estadio Akron. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Can Mazatlan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guadalajara's half?
Mazatlan have a dangerous throw-in.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara are whistled for offside.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Mazatlan close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
Guadalajara's Jose Macias breaks free at Estadio Akron. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Akron.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
The away team have replaced Martin Rodriguez with Candido Ramirez. This is the second substitution made today by Francisco Palencia.
In the minute 63, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 65, Jesus Angulo is on a sub for Uriel Antuna for Guadalajara.
Victor Vucetich (Guadalajara) is making a second substitution, with Eduardo Lopez replacing Alexis Vega.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
In the minute 68, Free kick Mazatlan.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Guadalajara.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 72, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Throw-in Mazatlan.
The away team replace Miguel Sansores with Fernando Aristeguieta.
Victor Vucetich is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Akron with Antonio Briseno replacing Jesus Sanchez.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez waits before resuming play because Jesus Molina for Guadalajara is still down.
It seems as if Jesus Molina is unable to continue. Fernando Beltran replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 86, Guadalajara make their fifth substitution with Oribe Peralta replacing Jose Macias.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
In the minute 87, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
Mazatlan make their fourth substitution with Sagir Arce replacing Carlos Vargas.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 89, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a throw-in for Mazatlan, close to Guadalajara's area.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guadalajara are coming forward and Cristian Calderon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Akron.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
